transparent_marketplace: A transparent marketplace connecting consumers with certified natural farmers.
verified_farmers_desc: Trust is authentically guaranteed through our rigorous verification process.
direct_market_desc: No middlemen ensuring fair pricing for both farmers and consumers.
certified_farmers_desc: FSSAI, Organic, and other certifications verified.
guide_title: Your Guide to a Transparent Marketplace
farmer_guide_desc: Learn how to register, get verified, and sell your products.
user_guide_desc: Understand how to browse, verify authenticity, and make purchases.
sarah_testimonial: I can now directly sell to my customers as a verified farmer. The transparency in the system is commendable.
michael_testimonial: FarmTrust has given me complete confidence in the authenticity of the products.
emma_testimonial: The quality of products and service are definitely recommend!
